messages.subject: Surgery
messages.msgSnippet: My wife just had her gall bladder removed - she had gall stones.  She has known about the stones since our second child, but she has put off the surgery until
messages.messageBody:
My wife just had her gall bladder removed - she had gall stones. She
has known about the stones since our second child, but she has put
off the surgery until the last moment (she was more worried about the
anesthesia than the pain until the day before yesterday). The reason
I bring this up here is because her doctor (not the surgeon, our
family practitioner) mentioned in passing that surgeons who play
video games are better at laproscopic surgeries than non video
players.

I guess anything CAN be learning!

Daniel

PS The surgery went fine and she is doing very well! She should be
home today.
